snippet: The unexpected departure of the boss of Capita highlights the challenges facing Britain's biggest outsourcing companies as the government tightens the screw on businesses that provide vital public services....

headline.main: Women’s Fashion Shows: Rick Owens, Chloé, Balmain

lead_paragraph: The unexpected departure of the boss of Capita highlights the challenges facing Britain's biggest outsourcing companies as the government tightens the screw on businesses that provide vital public services.
